description:
As Mikazuki Villa becomes more lively, Yachiyo is reminded by Mifuyu about the dangers of making new friends because of what happened to them in the past. Yachiyo becomes distant from the rest of the tenants while the others set off to visit the Uwasa of the Memory Museum.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yakusoku wa Gogo Sanji, Kioku Museum nite
約束は午後三時, 記憶ミュージアムにて
